segment.source: Microsoft Exchange properties (Surface Hub)
segment.target: Microsoft Exchange properties (Surface Hub)

segment.source: Some Microsoft Exchange properties of the device account must be set to particular values to have the best meeting experience on Microsoft Surface Hub.
segment.target: Some Microsoft Exchange properties of the device account must be set to particular values to have the best meeting experience on Microsoft Surface Hub.

segment.source: Microsoft Exchange properties (Surface Hub)
segment.target: Microsoft Exchange properties (Surface Hub)

segment.source: Some Microsoft Exchange properties of the device account must be set to particular values to have the best meeting experience on Microsoft Surface Hub.
segment.target: Some Microsoft Exchange properties of the device account must be set to particular values to have the best meeting experience on Microsoft Surface Hub.

segment.source: The following table lists various Exchange properties based on PowerShell cmdlet parameters, their purpose, and the values they should be set to.
segment.target: The following table lists various Exchange properties based on PowerShell cmdlet parameters, their purpose, and the values they should be set to.

segment.source: Property
segment.target: Property

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Value
segment.target: Value

segment.source: Impact
segment.target: Impact

segment.source: AutomateProcessing
segment.target: AutomateProcessing

segment.source: The AutomateProcessing parameter enables or disables calendar processing on the mailbox.
segment.target: The AutomateProcessing parameter enables or disables calendar processing on the mailbox.

segment.source: AutoAccept
segment.target: AutoAccept

segment.source: The Surface Hub will be able to automatically accept or decline meeting requests based on its availability.
segment.target: The Surface Hub will be able to automatically accept or decline meeting requests based on its availability.

segment.source: AddOrganizerToSubject
segment.target: AddOrganizerToSubject

segment.source: The AddOrganizerToSubject parameter specifies whether the meeting organizer's name is used as the subject of the meeting request.
segment.target: The AddOrganizerToSubject parameter specifies whether the meeting organizer's name is used as the subject of the meeting request.

segment.source: $False
segment.target: $False

segment.source: The welcome screen will not show the meeting organizer twice (instead of showing it as both the organizer and in the meeting subject).
segment.target: The welcome screen will not show the meeting organizer twice (instead of showing it as both the organizer and in the meeting subject).

segment.source: AllowConflicts
segment.target: AllowConflicts

segment.source: The AllowConflicts parameter specifies whether to allow conflicting meeting requests.
segment.target: The AllowConflicts parameter specifies whether to allow conflicting meeting requests.

segment.source: $False
segment.target: $False

segment.source: The Surface Hub will decline meeting requests that conflict with another meeting’s time.
segment.target: The Surface Hub will decline meeting requests that conflict with another meeting’s time.

segment.source: DeleteComments
segment.target: DeleteComments

segment.source: The DeleteComments parameter specifies whether to remove or keep any text in the message body of incoming meeting requests.
segment.target: The DeleteComments parameter specifies whether to remove or keep any text in the message body of incoming meeting requests.

segment.source: $False
segment.target: $False

segment.source: The message body of meetings can be retained and retrieved from a Surface Hub if you need it during a meeting.
segment.target: The message body of meetings can be retained and retrieved from a Surface Hub if you need it during a meeting.

segment.source: DeleteSubject
segment.target: DeleteSubject

segment.source: The DeleteSubject parameter specifies whether to remove or keep the subject of incoming meeting requests.
segment.target: The DeleteSubject parameter specifies whether to remove or keep the subject of incoming meeting requests.

segment.source: $False
segment.target: $False

segment.source: Meeting request subjects can be shown on the Surface Hub.
segment.target: Meeting request subjects can be shown on the Surface Hub.

segment.source: RemovePrivateProperty
segment.target: RemovePrivateProperty

segment.source: The RemovePrivateProperty parameter specifies whether to clear the private flag for incoming meeting requests.
segment.target: The RemovePrivateProperty parameter specifies whether to clear the private flag for incoming meeting requests.

segment.source: $False
segment.target: $False

segment.source: Private meeting subjects will show as Private on the welcome screen.
segment.target: Private meeting subjects will show as Private on the welcome screen.

segment.source: AddAdditionalResponse
segment.target: AddAdditionalResponse

segment.source: The AddAdditionalResponse parameter specifies whether additional information will be sent from the resource mailbox when responding to meeting requests.
segment.target: The AddAdditionalResponse parameter specifies whether additional information will be sent from the resource mailbox when responding to meeting requests.

segment.source: $True
segment.target: $True

segment.source: When a response is sent to a meeting request, custom text will be provided in the response.
segment.target: When a response is sent to a meeting request, custom text will be provided in the response.

segment.source: AdditionalResponse
segment.target: AdditionalResponse

segment.source: The AdditionalResponse parameter specifies the additional information to be included in responses to meeting requests.
segment.target: The AdditionalResponse parameter specifies the additional information to be included in responses to meeting requests.

segment.source: Note This text will not be sent unless AddAdditionalResponse is set to $True.
segment.target: Note This text will not be sent unless AddAdditionalResponse is set to $True.

segment.source: Your choice—the additional response can be used to inform people how to use a Surface Hub or point them towards resources.
segment.target: Your choice—the additional response can be used to inform people how to use a Surface Hub or point them towards resources.

segment.source: Adding an additional response message can provide people an introduction to how they can use a Surface Hub in their meeting.
segment.target: Adding an additional response message can provide people an introduction to how they can use a Surface Hub in their meeting.
